full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA BZANG SPYOD SMON LAM GYI RGYAL PO'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR BYA TSUL MI MTHUN YUL LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I RGYAL MTSAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES PA 'DI NI DANG LDAN BLO BZANG RAB BRTAN DANG, BRTZON 'GRUS RGYA MTSOS GNYIS KYI 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ^SH'AKYA DGE SLONG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYI SBYAR BA'O, ,'DI KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS KYI ZHES, BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG BDE SKYED DPAL PHUN SUM TSOGS GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,)
